mil7.5.8:1.1: “Bhante nāgasena, ‘gorūpassa cattāri aṅgāni gahetabbānī’ti yaṃ vadesi, katamāni tāni cattāri aṅgāni gahetabbānī”ti?
mil7.5.8:1.2: “Yathā, mahārāja, gorūpo sakaṃ gehaṃ na vijahati;
mil7.5.8:1.3: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena sako kāyo na vijahitabbo ‘aniccucchādanaparimaddanabhedanavikiraṇaviddhaṃsanadhammo ayaṃ kāyo’ti.
mil7.5.8:1.4: Idaṃ, mahārāja, gorūpassa paṭhamaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.
mil7.5.8:2.1: Puna caparaṃ, mahārāja, gorūpo ādinnadhuro sukhadukkhena dhuraṃ vahati;
mil7.5.8:2.2: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena ādinnabrahmacariyena sukhadukkhena yāva jīvitapariyādānā āpāṇakoṭikaṃ brahmacariyaṃ caritabbaṃ.
mil7.5.8:2.3: Idaṃ, mahārāja, gorūpassa dutiyaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.
mil7.5.8:3.1: Puna caparaṃ, mahārāja, gorūpo chandena ghāyamāno pānīyaṃ pivati;
mil7.5.8:3.2: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena ācariyupajjhāyānaṃ anusiṭṭhi chandena pemena pasādena ghāyamānena paṭiggahetabbā.
mil7.5.8:3.3: Idaṃ, mahārāja, gorūpassa tatiyaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.
mil7.5.8:4.1: Puna caparaṃ, mahārāja, gorūpo yena kenaci vāhiyamāno vahati;
mil7.5.8:4.2: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena theranavamajjhimabhikkhūnampi gihiupāsakassāpi ovādānusāsanī sirasā sampaṭicchitabbā.
mil7.5.8:4.3: Idaṃ, mahārāja, gorūpassa catutthaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.
